page.title: 01General Review of Area
page.content: The main area which is comprised of Bagnall and its surroundings are hilly,rough grazing and pasture land with a few outcrops of woodland which suggests the main industry is farming, with beef and dairy the main products. The main features are the sub-station owned by the Central Electricity Generating Board which supplies the Midlands with electricity;the nurserys which offer the public gardening facilities and the Hospital which is for the mentally retarded. Bagnall is an authentic styled village with old styled cottages,but in the Werrington area there is a modern estate of new semi-detached and detached houses. The roads which make the Area accessible are narrow country lanes.
